name: Billy accidentally creates wormholes in the garage
name_original: Billy accidentally creates wormholes in the garage
description:
Billy accidentally creates wormholes in the garage - the story begins! He doesn't realize that his action has consequences for the entire universe. 

Find out what adventures billy encounters!

This is a submission for the  Black and White Jam #8↷∞ .

Controls:

- WASD to move

- space-bar to shoot or continue dialogue

Credits:
